resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password
resetPassword.successDescription: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now login with your new password.
resetPassword.tokenExpired: This password reset link has expired or is invalid. Please request a new one.
resetPassword.tokenMissing: No reset token found. Please use the link from your email.

errors.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
